title: Saakashvili Spring
description: Oscar-nominated short about the destruction of war and the lasting impact felt by our youth.
altHero: a black and white shot of a young girl looking at the sky and sticking her tongue out as colorful debris falls around her
alt1: in a destroyed city, an army tank points its cannon at the girl
alt2: the girl embraces a golden sunflower
alt3: the girl lies unconscious on the ground, surrounded by the colorful debris
